messages.content: Tell me a really good joke!

Sure! Here's a joke for you:

Why did the tomato turn red?

Because it saw the salad dressing!
That's not a good joke. Tell  me a better one!

I apologize if the previous joke didn't work for you. Here's another one:

Why did the bicycle fall over?

Because it was two-tired!
Erz√§hl mir einen sehr guten, sehr lustigen Witz!

Of course! Here's a really good, fun joke for you:

Why did the math book look so sad?

Because it had too many problems.
